attackTemplate: ATTACKER targets TARGET with a distance of RANGE
discordInviteTitle: Any ideas? Feedback? Want to help translate the website to you language? Join our discord!
partyHint: Click on the tiles to add/move heroes. Click on the party list to add/change heroes!
dialogHint: You can also press enter to select first hero in the list
shareDialogInfo: Copy this link to share your layout!
helpDialogCharAiTypesDesc: Heroes have a couple different AI presets, that matter during the target selection.
helpDialogMeleeAiInfoDesc: Heroes with Melee AI, target the nearest untargeted hero. If none are available, they target the nearest hero instead.
helpDialogRangedAiInfoDesc: Heroes with Ranged AI target the nearest hero.
helpDialogAllyAiInfoDesc: Heroes with Buffer AI, try to buff their allies; they target the furthest allied hero.
helpDialogAssassinAiInfoDesc: Heroes with Assassin AI target heroes of the ranged class. If there are multiple ranged class enemy heroes, they try to target the closest untargeted ranged class hero. If there is a single ranged class hero in the enemy team, they target it, regardless if it's targeted or not. If the enemy team has no ranged class heroes, Assassin AI heroes use Melee targeting instead.
helpDialogOrderMattersDesc: When planning, don't forget to make sure, that your heroes are in the correct order! Targeting goes from party leader to the last character in your team, so the order matters a lot. The same goes for the enemy team.
helpDialogThingsToConsiderDesc: There are more things to Colosseum, than initial targeting. Advanced Colosseum players should also consider taunts and target reset! For target reset info, consider watching this video
